abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32633815, pmid32633162, pmid32627622, pmid32639848, pmid32628642, pmid32639537, pmid32628664, pmid32628793, pmid32628405, pmid32628242, pmid32622082
